sub_topic: Determining the length of a side in an equilateral triangle.
message_1: An equilateral triangle has a perimeter of 18 cm. What is the length of each side of the triangle in centimeters?
message_2:
An equilateral triangle has three equal sides. To find the length of each side, we can divide the perimeter by the number of sides.

Perimeter = 18 cm
Number of sides = 3

Length of each side = 18 cm / 3 = 6 cm
